name: Github
description: Automatically add your Github timeline to any theme.

element.label: Element
element.info: Enter the selector of the element where you would like your commits to appear. If left blank it will simply be appended to the html body. You can also enter more than one selector if necessary by comma delimiting them (e.g. #header,#footer).

numOfItems.label: # of commits to show
numOfItems.info: Select the maximum number of events that you would like shown.

showBranch.label: Show branch
showBranch.info: If selected this will display the branch that the commit was made to below your commit description.
